resources.string:
Kamil Tyszkiewicz is a 22-year-old gym assistant who enjoys cycling, watching television and bowling. He is exciting and energetic, but can also be very unfriendly and a bit violent. 
He is Polish who defines himself as straight. He finished school and then left academia. He is obsessed with bottled water. 
Physically, Kamil is in pretty good shape. He is tall with olive skin, brown hair and brown eyes. 
He grew up in a working class neighbourhood. He was raised by his father, his mother having left when he was young. 
He is currently single. His most recent romance was with a plumber called Natalia Yvonne Peterson, who was 10 years older than him. They broke up because Natalia got fed up of how Kamil talked to people. 
Kamil s best friend is a gym assistant called Gloria Gray. They have a very firey friendship. He also hangs around with Bianca Bryant and Andrei Ross. They enjoy ferret racing together.
